thread.title: Erica

author: Erica
title: Erica
text: I placed my order on January 24th and it arrived January 30th. I was completely shocked the package arrived today from Belgium to the US! Shipping was estimated between 4-8 days and I always assume the worst with international shipping and custom issues. I was hoping it would arrive by Friday. I am beyond delighted the package came sooner than anticipated. It was also so beautifully packaged! The box itself is adorable! The garment received was true to its description (incl. measurements) and photos. I am pleased and will be looking forward to ordering more items. I would definitely recommend Top Vintage to others!
